metadata.title: CVE-2020-27170 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.8.kernel/bpf/verifier.c performs undesirable out-of-bounds speculation onpointer arithmetic, leading to side-channel attacks that defeat Spectremitigations and obtain sensitive information from kernel memory, akaCID-f232326f6966. This affects pointer types that do not define aptr_limit.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
